title: Synchronized Search Retargeting Entity
description: Details about AdCloud Search Retargeting Entity used for retargeting surfers on the Search channel.

xdm:retargeting-entity-id.title: Retargeting entity ID
xdm:retargeting-entity-id.description: Id for the retargeting entity that would used to retarget the surfer.

xdm:timestamp.title: Timestamp
xdm:timestamp.description: The timestamp when the retargeting entity, e.g. aam-segment, was sycned to the search engine.

xdm:search-engine-id.title: Search Engine ID
xdm:search-engine-id.description: Internal mapping of search engines to IDs for Adcloud Search.

xdm:search-engine-data.title: Search Engine Data
xdm:search-engine-data.description: Conversion Id of the retargeting entity synced to search engine.
